root.name: Trashman
root.description: Trashman had you collecting trash against a time limit. You have to keep up with the trash truck that only waits a limited amount of time outside each house before moving on. Obstacles you had to avoid were the traffic and angry dogs. Â When collecting the trash can to take to the truck you were penalized if you walked off the path on to the grass of a house and had to take the empty trash can back once it was emptied
